alert.note: Alert for Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:15PM CDT until May 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LAWRENCE...CRAWFORD...SOUTHEASTERN JASPER AND NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 315 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chauncey, or 12 miles northeast of Olney, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Chauncey around 320 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hardinville, New Hebron, Birds, Flat Rock and Palestine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
